Shri Venkateshwaran is an Indian Journalist and news anchor working as Chief of Thuglak Digital and as personal secretary for research and writings for the Editor of Thuglak Magazine S Gurumurthy
Education and career
Shri Venkateshwaran studied at Ramakrishna Mission Vivekananda College. He worked in Deloitte US as external auditor through direct placement from college. He learnt Indian Carnatic Classical music from famous playback singer Dr Nithyasree Mahadevan and her mother Smt.Lalitha Sivakumar. He has completed his articles in Chartered Accountancy and audited multiple verticals including consumer and industrial products, Real Estate, Banking and Automobiles. Boeing, Dow chemicals, IDBI Greams Road, TVS Auto Mobiles, TVS Emerald are few notable companies he has audited during his employment and trainings. He then was mentored in journalism by senior journalist of Thanthi Tv Rangaraj Pandey, the founder and CEO of Chanakyaa from 2019-2021. During 2021, he hosted the Thuglak Anniversary being a part of Chanakyaa and for his exemplary works he was called to head the Digital wing of Thuglak. Since 2021 he has been heading Thuglak Digital and in December 2021, the MD of Thuglak Digital Sridhar Kamakoti appointed Shri Venkateshwaran as Chief of Thuglak Digital. From then Thuglak Digital grew its subscriptions in massive scale and has become one of the most subscribed Regional Digital Magazine in India, based out of Tamil Nadu. Shri Venkateshwaran has been hosting several shows since his entry in Journalism from Chanakyaa. Shri Venkateshwaran hosted the famous Ask Pandey show during his period at Chanakyaa and worked on interviewing multiple political personalities. He was one among the prominent news readers with classic Tamil pronunciations backed by his formal trainings taken with Rangaraj Pandey and Nithyasree Mahadevan. He started his career as a fresher in Chanakyaa and in a matter of 3 years he became Senior News Correspondent and immediately Chief of Thuglak Digital. In Thuglak, he is currently running two main shows. 1) Vedippurappesu  - An opinion show covering regional, national and international socio political issues and Keladhavai Ketkin, where he interviews multiple stars and political personalities. BJP leader K._Annamalai, Kushboo, Congress Leader Karti Chidambaram, Art of Living convener Sri Sri Sri Ravishankar,  Spiritual speaker Dushyant Sridhar, are a few notable personalities interviewed by Shri Venkateshwaran. He does investigative journalism exposing critical issues and writes in Thuglak Magazine. He supports Thuglak Editor S Gurumurthy in Research and writings. In his stint in Indian Carnatic Classical Music, he has accompanied his Guru Dr. Nithyasree Mahadevan on hundreds of stages and shows including prestigious sabhas and auditoriums in his active musical career between 2014 and 2019.
